body:
Hello Everyone!
I have decided to make an unofficial Avicus Yearbook and am accepting people to help me make this Yearbook possible, Remember to be as detailed as possible! Please apply in this format:
IGN:
Time Zone:
Any Yearbook type experience?:
How would you benefit the Yearbook team?:
Skype?:
Anything else?:
We need a Developer for a website to showcase our yearbook ASAP! You do not need to apply for this position just knowledge in HTML and Website Building.

title: Unofficial Avicus Yearbook

replies.body:
IGN: alexanderjoe10
Time Zone: EST (Eastern Stander time aka New York time)
Any Yearbook type experience?: Ohh... I was just going to supply pics and help with some editing
How would you beefit the Yearbook team?: I have a lot of pictures and small experience in yearbooks
Skype: If you don't have I swear I will.....(alexanderjoe10.exe)
Anything else?: Nawwwww I'm fine

replies.body:
IGN: miningflamingo
Time Zone: AWST (Australian Western Standard Time)
Any Yearbook type experience?: No, but I am above average at yearbook-type things like photography and editing.
How would you benefit the Yearbook team?: I can get good pictures that will suit the time and context perfectly and I am pretty good at editing video if that skill is required. With photography I am also above average for Adobe Photoshop and I have made channel arts for people.
Skype?: MiningFlamingo
Anything else?: Nope.

replies.body: Need Developer ASAP, We also have spots left

replies.body:
IGN: JKawesome
Time Zone: PST
Any Yearbook type experience?: Nope
How would you benefit the Yearbook team?: I am proficient in HTML, CSS, and other web languages, including server side. I have had around 5 years of experience in that field, and currently have a part time job as a web developer. I can code fast, and have a good eye for design as well. I am proficient in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator as well, editing on a graphic tablet.
Skype?: JKPlaysMinecraft
Anything else?: You need a developer, so I'm here

replies.body:
I might be able to do some coding if needed.

Some examples:
http://maticmessofmaps.github.io/
http://stattrack.github.io/

Ask ParaSpider or Evo for my skype. I don't want to give it out in public. Also include some info with the request otherwise I won't accept it.
